product_details.name: Marshall Major V On-Ear Bluetooth Headphone, Black
product_details.description:
- True icons never die; they just get better with time.
- Major V is no different.
- From its explosive Marshall signature sound to its everlasting design, every detail of these headphones has been painstakingly considered and refined.
- Featuring 100+ hours of wireless playtime combined with a rugged and foldable design, Major V is best paired with your next great adventure.

banner_details:
The banner features a bold, product-focused advertisement for headphones, utilizing a high-contrast dark theme with golden accents. The backdrop is composed of layered black and charcoal-toned geometric and circular elements, adding subtle depth and modern appeal. Centrally placed is the headset image (`product_image`), framed within concentric circular outlines to direct the viewer's focus. The header text (`heading`) is prominently displayed at the top in large white uppercase font, followed by a golden subheading (`subheading`) below. A product tagline (`tagline`) is placed near the bottom in symmetrical alignment, above the highlighted price (`price`) in gold. A rectangular gold call-to-action button (`cta_button`) contains dark text (`cta`) prompting immediate purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #1A1A1A
- Charcoal Grey: #2D2D2D / #212121
- Gold: #D4AF37
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image showcases sleek, premium black Marshall headphones, presented in an all-black matte and textured finish. The primary color used is a deep **matte black** (#121212), which dominates the product and conveys a bold, modern, and minimalist aesthetic. The **textured black leather** (#1A1A1A) on the headband and earcups adds visual depth. The **metallic gold accent** (#D4AF37) near the port subtly contrasts the overall dark tones, drawing attention while maintaining elegance. The **white logo text** (#FFFFFF) stands out crisply against the dark background, enhancing brand visibility. The overall palette suggests sophistication, ideal for banners targeting style-conscious audiophiles.
